attributes.action: To create a people’s commission to review the existing political system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The commission’s members are to be nominated and elected by the people, from people living within their communities. 

Once elected, the commission’s role is to review the existing electoral system to initiate a process that will reflect the people’s democratic wishes by maintaining, changing or replacing the existing political system as it affects all aspects of our lives.

None of the commission’s members can derive from any of the existing political parties.
